member.name: CHANGER_EXCHANGE_MEDIUM
member.summary: Contains information theIOCTL_CHANGER_EXCHANGE_MEDIUM control code uses to move a piece of media to a destination, and the piece of media originally in the first destination to a second destination.

member.name: CHANGER_EXCHANGE_MEDIUM.Transport
member.summary: A structure that indicates which transport element to use for the exchange operation. The ElementType member of this structure must be ChangerTransport.

member.name: CHANGER_EXCHANGE_MEDIUM.Source
member.summary: A structure that indicates the element that contains the media that is to be moved.

member.name: CHANGER_EXCHANGE_MEDIUM.Destination1
member.summary: A structure that indicates the element that is the destination of the media originally at Source.

member.name: CHANGER_EXCHANGE_MEDIUM.Destination2
member.summary: A structure that indicates the element that is the destination of the media originally at Destination1.

member.name: CHANGER_EXCHANGE_MEDIUM.Flip1
member.summary: If this member is TRUE, the medium at Destination1 should be flipped. Otherwise, it should not. This member is valid only if the Features0 member of the structure is CHANGER_MEDIUM_FLIP.

member.name: CHANGER_EXCHANGE_MEDIUM.Flip2
member.summary: If this member is TRUE, the medium at Destination2 should be flipped. Otherwise, it should not. This member is valid only if the Features0 member of the structure is CHANGER_MEDIUM_FLIP.
